basics.name: Skylor Piersall
basics.label: Patient Care Specialist
basics.summary: Dedicated and versatile professional with experience spanning healthcare, food service management, manufacturing, and operations support. Skilled in team leadership, hands-on production, order fulfillment, and customer service, with a proven ability to adapt to diverse work environments. Recognized for reliability, attention to detail, and a strong work ethic in both independent and collaborative roles.
basics.objective: Seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my diverse experience in operations, customer service, and team leadership to contribute to organizational efficiency, growth, and overall success.

work.name: Teen Parents Succeeding
work.summary: Assisted in supervising and caring for children in a safe, nurturing, and engaging environment. Supported daily routines including meals, activities, and rest periods while promoting social and educational development. Maintained a clean, organized, and child-friendly space, ensuring compliance with health and safety standards.

work.name: Millers Marry Manor
work.summary: Delivered compassionate patient care by assisting with daily living activities such as bathing, dressing, feeding, and mobility. Monitored and documented vital signs, promptly reporting changes in patient conditions to nursing staff. Supported medical professionals with routine procedures, ensuring patient comfort and safety.

work.name: Hacienda Mexican Restaurant
work.summary: Provided attentive customer service by taking orders, delivering food and beverages, and ensuring guest satisfaction. Maintained knowledge of menu items and specials to answer questions and make recommendations. Handled transactions accurately while maintaining a clean and organized dining area.

work.name: Forte Residential
work.summary: Assisted elderly residents with daily living activities, including personal hygiene, meals, mobility, and medication reminders. Provided companionship and emotional support, fostering a positive and respectful environment. Monitored health and safety needs, promptly reporting concerns to supervisors or medical staff.

work.name: Warsaw Meadows Care Center
work.summary: Planned, organized, and led recreational and therapeutic activities to enhance residentsâ€™ physical, emotional, and social well-being. Coordinated with healthcare staff to design programs tailored to individual needs and rehabilitation goals. Encouraged participation through engaging events that promoted mobility, cognitive function, and community involvement.

work.name: Superior Cleaning
work.summary: Delivered professional cleaning services across multiple business settings, maintaining high standards of safety and sanitation. Ensured work areas were consistently well-maintained, organized, and compliant with company and client expectations. Provided exceptional customer service, addressing client needs promptly and fostering positive professional relationships.

work.name: Heartland RV
work.summary: Prepared and packaged bolts and parts according to customer specifications, maintaining strict accuracy and attention to detail. Inspected components for quality and consistency, ensuring all orders met company standards before shipment. Coordinated with team members to meet deadlines and ensure timely order fulfillment, supporting overall operational efficiency.

work.name: 5 Star Cleaning Services
work.summary: Delivered professional cleaning services across multiple business settings, maintaining high standards of safety and sanitation. Ensured work areas were consistently well-maintained, organized, and compliant with company and client expectations. Provided exceptional customer service, addressing client needs promptly and fostering positive professional relationships.
